Hi,
Mostly I develop LOB application using Prism + MEF as a framework and WCF: the point is how to handle WCF project within such framework: should I treat WCF project as a regular Module meaning to use Exporting, Importing for registering and resolving classes and implementing IModule ...etc. or there is a specific way to handle WCF especially in Client-Server architecture
Thanks

Hi jivara,

You could write wrapper classes fir your wcf proxies and export them into the classes (ideally your viewmodels) to consume. They can be in a seperate class lib project. No need to treat it as a module per se!

Cheers!

Hi gan_s,
Thanks for quick reply. Do you have any example showing this approach? if no could you kindly create one?
Thanks.

HI Jivara,

Based on my understanding I think it follows a similar approach as the one mentioned by gan_s above.

  • Using WCF services in Prism Silverlight applications
